inline.description:
Display - Fixed width
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
1. Go to Settings ➜ Display ➜ Channel Display ➜ Edit
2. Select "Fixed width, centered"
3. Save
4. Expand the window to take up your whole screen.
inline.expectedResult: • The center channel text should be centered over the textbox, including the channel intro text at the beginning of a channel (may need refresh or channel switch).
